name: Chip-Boi
description:
A precise platformer game with a twist.

Zip'ten çıkartmayı Unutmayın !

-Developers-
Muhammed Emin Altun
Çağatay Demir
Koyan
Furkan Karabudak

-Used Assets-

  • Sfx -> SoundSnap.com
  • Music -> Short Retro Action Loop from Music loops mini set
  • Other things were made by us in 72 hours.

Made in GameMaker Studio 2 for the At0m Jam #2 with the theme of "Cheat to Win" in 72 hours.

Controls:

  • WASD - (Movement)
  • E/Space - (Interact)
  • R - (Restart the room)
  • PageUp-PageDown - (Switch Between Rooms [in Debug Mode])

-IMPORTANT NOTE-

-DON'T FORGET TO EXTRACT THE ZIP, otherwise game can crash. -Please use "Screen Capture" to stream the game with OBS, not "Game Capture". If you got "STUCK" in a room, just set (DEBUG_MODE) as "true" in SETTINGS.txt file. Then press "PageUp-PageDown" keys to switch between rooms. DEBUG_MODE IS 'NOT' THE CHEATING METHOD we design for this game !! It's just to make it easier for players who are stuck in a room bc it's too hard.
